docs.lead_paragraph: Once part of the International Toy Center, the building at 1107 Broadway is being converted to 125 condos, most of which will be three-bedrooms.

headline.seo: Sales to Start Soon at 10 Madison Square West
headline.main: No Toys, but a Park Nearby
headline.print_headline: No Toys, but a Park Nearby

docs.abstract: Ten Madison Square West, former 16-story Toy Building North near Manhattan's Madison Square Park, is being converted to 125 condominiums; building, which commands stupendous views of some of city's most iconic architecture, was once home to vast showrooms for toy manufacturers.
docs.snippet: Once part of the International Toy Center, the building at 1107 Broadway is being converted to 125 condos, most of which will be three-bedrooms.
